Package socialmedia

Class Account

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Account is a class that encapsulates user functionality for the social media platform. Each instance of account has a unique id and handle attributes, which is enforced within the social media class's functionality. Account extends serializable so that it can be serialised allowing for the social media platform to be saved, loaded, etc.
See Also:
